Suffolk Libraries children's book advent calendar 2016

Every day until Christmas Eve our children's book expert Jo suggests a book for a Christmas present.

December 1

Owl Babies, by Martin Waddell

Today's book is Owl Babies, by Martin Waddell.

December 2

Where The Wild Things Are, by Maurice Sendak.

Today's book is Where The Wild Things Are, by Maurice Sendak.

December 3

Mad Iris, by Jeremy Strong

Today's book is Mad Iris, by Jeremy Strong.

December 4

I'll Wait, Mr Panda, by Steve Antony

Today's book is I'll Wait, Mr Panda, by Steve Antony

December 5

Aliens Stole My Dog, by Ian Whybrow

Today's book is Aliens Stole My Dog, by Ian Whybrow.

December 6

The Paw Print Puzzle, by Clara Vulliamy

Today's book is The Paw Print Puzzle, by Clara Vulliamy.

December 7

Alienography 2: tips for tiny tyrants, by Chris Riddell

Today's book is Alienography 2: tips for tiny tyrants, by Chris Riddell.

December 8

10 Minute No-bake Makes, by Annalees Lim

Today's book is 10 Minute No-bake Makes, by Annalees Lim.

December 9

Have You Seen Elephant?, by David Barrow

Today's book is Have You Seen Elephant?, by David Barrow.

December 10

Rabbit's Bad Habits, by Julian Gough & Jim Field

Today's book is Rabbit's Bad Habits, by Julian Gough & Jim Field.

December 11

My Gym Teacher Is An Alien Overlord, by David Solomons

Today's book is My Gym Teacher Is An Alien Overlord, by David Solomons.

December 12

Word Nerd, by Susin Nielsen

Today's book is Word Nerd, by Susin Nielsen.

December 13

An Infographic Guide To Football, by Corinne Lucas

Today's book is An Infographic Guide To Football, by Corinne Lucas.

December 14

Penguin, by Polly Dunbar

Today's book is Penguin, by Polly Dunbar.

December 15

Scout and the Sausage Thief, by Gill Lewis

Today's book is Scout and the Sausage Thief, by Gill Lewis.

December 16

Danger is Everywhere: a handbook for avoiding danger, by David O'Doherty & Chris Judge

Today's book is Danger is Everywhere: a handbook for avoiding danger, by David O'Doherty & Chris Judge.

December 17

Lydia: the wild girl of Pride & Prejudice, by Natasha Farrant

Today's book is Lydia: the wild girl of Pride & Prejudice, by Natasha Farrant.

December 18

Animasaurus: incredible animals that roamed the earth, by Tracey Turner & Harriet Russell

Today's book is Animasaurus: incredible animals that roamed the earth, by Tracey Turner & Harriet Russell.

December 18

Jack Frost, by Kazuno Kohara

Today's book is Jack Frost, by Kazuno Kohara.

December 20

Wigglesbottom Primary: The Magic Hamster, by Pamela Butchart & Becka Moor

Today's book is Wigglesbottom Primary: The Magic Hamster, by Pamela Butchart & Becka Moor.

December 21

Usborne Christmas Quiz Book, by Simon Tudhope & Kate Rimmer

Today's book is Usborne Christmas Quiz Book, by Simon Tudhope & Kate Rimmer.

December 22

Julius Zebra: Bundle with the Britons!, by Gary Northfield

Today's book is Julius Zebra: Bundle with the Britons!, by Gary Northfield.

December 23

The Laugh Out Loud Joke Book, by Michael Rosen

Today's book is The Laugh Out Loud Joke Book, by Michael Rosen.

December 24

We Wish You a Merry Christmas, by Yu-Hsuan Huang

Today's book is We Wish You a Merry Christmas, by Yu-Hsuan Huang.
